search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Dubsado (dubsado.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Dubsado is [https://www.dubsado.com/pricing](https://www.dubsado.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/024fe1f9-77b1-4265-8e49-8febc3b7e428/Background+7.png)

Plans that power your passion
-----------------------------

Invest in a system that works as hard as you do, and create organized processes that save you more time for what you love. Choose from plans that grow with you.

```
Start for free. Upgrade when you’re ready to grow.
```

Choose annual and get 2 months worth of savings

### Starter

The all-you-need basics for organized client management

#### $20

*   Unlimited projects & clients
    
*   Invoicing & payment plans
    
*   Form & email templates
    

[Upgrade now](https://hello.dubsado.com/user/signup)

### Premier

Automation for growth and to enhance your client experience

#### $40

**Everything in the Starter plan, plus:**

*   Scheduling
    
*   Automated workflows
    
*   Public proposals
    
*   Multiple lead captures at once
    
*   Zapier integration
    

[Upgrade now](https://hello.dubsado.com/user/signup)

### Starter

The all-you-need basics for organized client management

#### $200

*   Unlimited projects & clients
    
*   Invoicing & payment plans
    
*   Form & email templates
    

[Upgrade now](https://hello.dubsado.com/user/signup)

### Premier

Automation for growth and to enhance your client experience

#### $400

**Everything in the Starter plan, plus:**

*   Scheduling
    
*   Automated workflows
    
*   Public proposals
    
*   Multiple lead captures at once
    
*   Zapier integration
    

[Upgrade now](https://hello.dubsado.com/user/signup)

| Features | Starter Plan
$200/yr

 | Premier Plan

$400/yr

 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Email integration

Connect all your email communications in one place.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Unlimited projects & clients

Manage unlimited number of clients and projects.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Invoicing & payment plans

Create and manage invoices and payment schedules.

 | ✓ | ✓ |

Access pre-built templates for forms and emails.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Client portals

Give clients their own dedicated portal for project access.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Calendar connection

Sync with your calendar for streamlined scheduling.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Free email & live chat support

Get help when you need it via email or live chat.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Mobile app access

Access your dashboard on the go with our mobile app.

 | ✓ | ✓ |
| Active lead capture forms

Create forms to capture and manage new leads.

 | 1 | Unlimited |
| Bookkeeping integration

Connect with popular bookkeeping software.

 | ✗ | ✓ |
| Scheduling

Advanced scheduling and booking capabilities.

 | ✗ | ✓ |
| Automated workflows

Create automated processes for repetitive tasks.

 | ✗ | ✓ |
| Public proposals

Share and track proposal status with clients.

 | ✗ | ✓ |
| Zapier integration

Connect with thousands of apps through Zapier.

 | ✗ | ✓ |

![Image 2](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/aeaee230-cda7-4315-ac85-ba6d9fd5eb88/Client-management.jpg)

Enjoy running your business—without letting it run you
------------------------------------------------------

When you have a single system to help you capture and convert new clients, send and execute contracts, manage invoices and get paid, onboard your clients, and close out your projects, you can take off the “many hats” you don’t want to wear. Work with your clients better. And lead every project with confidence.

Pay as you grow
---------------

**Brands**

Manage each of your businesses with separate brands. Swap between them with just a click.

```
$10/mo
```

per additional brand

**Users**

Bring your team with you. Customize the account access for each user. Enjoy 3 additional users for free.

4–10 users: **$25/mo**  
11–20 users: **$45/mo**  
21–30 users: **$60/mo**

_For 30+ users,_ [_send us an email_](mailto:hello@dubsado.com) _._

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

*   Both plans serve our mission: to help you communicate, schedule, organize, manage your business, and get paid.
    
    Which plan is best for you depends on where you are on your journey. Diving headfirst into complex business management tools can be a daunting task, so **if you’re just starting out, the Starter plan is for you**. You’ll get access to things like form creation tools, invoicing, canned emails, and client portals, all in one simple package. It’s a whole lot of bang for your buck, as the kids say. They still say that, right?
    
    **The Premier plan is for business owners who need to streamline their process.** Being busy is a great problem to have, but it can quickly get overwhelming. With advanced features like scheduling templates, automated workflows, and bookkeeping integration, rest assured that you can take your hands off of the steering wheel when you need to, and your business will keep moving.
    
*   There's **no time limit** on our trial and you'll be able to book up to 3 clients before subscribing.
    
    What's most important to us is that you feel comfortable getting to know Dubsado and can truly see if we're the best fit for your business, _without a pressure-filled time limit._ After all, you’re trusting us to help you manage and grow your business and that's not something we take lightly.
    
    [Start your free trial](http://www.dubsado.com/trial) today and give all of our features a spin. \*No credit card info required
    
*   We’re so glad you asked.
    
    We’re not afraid to brag about our world-class support team. In fact, the word “support” was too weak to describe the incredible work they do. So we upgraded the name.
    
    Our **Customer Care** team doesn’t just help you troubleshoot—they educate, encourage, assist, advise, and so much more. Even if you’re running your business on your own, you’ll never be alone.
    
    They’re also huge fans of reaction gifs. Come say hi!
    

[![Image 3: Krystal Clark.png](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/1731623802248-4GQ4SVQNQ2064GZ5TZDN/Krystal+Clark.png)](https://www.dubsado.com/testimonials/kr8r9gyt23ayv9mq40cm4wjjrktfc4)

Every time I send a proposal, my clients are blown away and book my services in minutes! Presenting my services mini sales page style with on-brand design has changed the game.

_\- Krystal Clark_

[![Image 4: Fran Rescigno](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/1731534887086-1RN73IY6H7XB7WCYHYYL/Fran+Rescigno+%281%29.jpg)](https://www.dubsado.com/testimonials/blog-post-title-one-mtpg8)

Using Dubsado is one of the big reasons why I'm able to structure my business in a way that supports my neurodivergence, instead of it being something that I feel is hindering me. The impact that Dubsado had on my business and my life was so great that it made me want to have that impact for other entrepreneurs and their businesses too!

_\- Fran Rescigno_

[![Image 5: Blog Post Title Two](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/1731622991423-U7G1ED89JIV8NYQA06HK/Amber+Broder+%281%29.jpg)](https://www.dubsado.com/testimonials/blog-post-title-two-y3fgb)

It's reduced a lot of the energy and brain space I had to spend on admin tasks, tasks that used to take 5-10 hours each week. Now that time is freed up to work on client deliverables or growing my business.

_\- Amber Broder_

[![Image 6: Blog Post Title Three](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/1731623236508-QZK4QHHOBUCT5X47Q1DC/Betsan+Coleman.png)](https://www.dubsado.com/testimonials/blog-post-title-three-yhc2j)

The HOURS of admin time that Dubsado has saved me is mind blowing! No more sitting at my desk to work on a new project to then realize you have an endless list of admin to catch up on!

_\- Betsan Coleman_

[![Image 7: Blog Post Title Four](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/1731623548939-RGRDJJDUM6GTKXF8LI4S/Chloe+Gandal+%281%29+%281%29.jpg)](https://www.dubsado.com/testimonials/blog-post-title-four-6kbfd)

WOW I mean Dubsado has been the most important piece of software to support me in my full-time travel lifestyle this year. Without Dubsado, I wouldn't have been able to manage the volume of clients that I needed to sustain myself or had the time to enjoy the places I visited while traveling.

_\- Chloe Gandal_

![Image 8](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/67099a111e793032cecc27c6/98a58ee2-43b2-44f8-8d74-f5ef94014cb0/send-invoices-fast.jpg)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Dubsado offers a free tier with no time limit, allowing up to 3 clients before requiring a subscription.
